HOURS & Location

145 calhoun Street unit 301charleston, sc

Located in the heart of Downtown Charleston, Ritual is nestled high above King and Calhoun Street. With breathtaking views of the Cooper River Bridge, Marion Square, and more.

Charleston Restaurant Week

Charleston Restaurant Week is the perfect reason to experience Ritual CHS. From¬†, the downtown destination offers a thoughtfully curated¬†, showcasing Coastal Mexican inspired flavors with Ritual‚Äôs signature Tulum flair.

Our menu opens with a taste of empanadas filled with garlic mushrooms or slow-roasted chicken tinga, followed by vibrant starters like guacamole or shrimp aguachile. Entr√©e options include tomatillo-lime braised chicken, roasted chile relleno, or an elevated¬†(pictured above). Dessert brings a sweet finish with churros, or our tres leches tart.
braised boneless short rib finished with cranberry mole 
Handcrafted cocktail¬†specials, including classic margaritas and our favorite seasonal specials, round out the experience. For diners seeking bold flavor, atmosphere, and exceptional value, we are a standout this Restaurant Week!
